casebody.data:
MORGAN
v.
MILLENNIUM STAFFING. No. 533P07-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008.

Katherine M. Morgan, Pro Se.

Kelli A. Burns, for Millennium Staffing, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of April 2008 by Defendants for Sanctions:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
